summary: An electronics expert creates a huge bookie broadcast system for his crime boss, and takes over operations when his boss is murdered. His greed leads him on a deadly destructive path.
cast: Edmond O'Brien|Joanne Dru|Otto Kruger|Barry Kelley|Dorothy Patrick|Don Porter|Howard St. John|Robert Osterloh|Sammy White|Fred Aldrich|Phillip Barnes|Jay Barney|Gail Bonney|Ralph Brooks|Frank Dae|George DeNormand|Sidney Dubin|Charles Ferguson|Bert Freed|William Getts|Edward Grandpere|Joe Gray|Robert Haines|Al Hill|Charles Jordan|Charles La Torre|Harry Lauter|George Magrill|Hank Mann|Earl Merritt|Carl Milletaire|Ralph Montgomery|Cleo Moore|Joey Ray|Jack Raymond|Walter Sande|Larry Steers|Amzie Strickland|Brick Sullivan|Duke Watson|Jack Weiler
title: Al filo de la vida
